00013 // _factorial (n,b) = n!/(b-1)! ie n*(n-1)*...*b
00014 inline long _factorial( long value, long endval = 1 )
00015 {
00016   if (value > endval)
00017     return ( value * _factorial( value - 1 ) );
00018 
00019   return endval;
00020 }

00025 inline long power( long num, long pow )
00026 {
00027   long res = num;
00028   for (long i=1; i!=pow; ++i)
00029     res *= num;
00030 
00031   return res;

00034 inline bool _TestBitI( unsigned long num, unsigned long i )
00035 {
00036   int bit = ((num >> i) & 1);
00037   if (bit == 1)
00038     return true;
00039     
00040   return false;
00041 }
00042 
00043 inline void _NumberToBoolArray( unsigned long num, std::vector<bool>& boolarray, unsigned long length )
00044 {
00045   for (unsigned long i=0; i!=length; ++i)
00046   {
00047     boolarray[(length-1)-i] = _TestBitI( num, i );
00048   }
00049 }
00050 
00051 inline long _CountNumZeroes( unsigned long num, unsigned long length )
00052 {
00053   long tot = 0;
00054   for (unsigned long i=0; i!=length; ++i)
00055   {
00056     if ( _TestBitI( num, i ) )
00057       ++tot;
00058   }
00059   return tot;
00060 }
00061 
00062 inline bool _IsPowerOfTwo ( long value )
00063 {
00064   if (value < 1)
00065     return false;
00066 
00067   return (value & (~value+1)) == value;  //~value+1 equals a two's complement -value
00068 }
